wikipedia_page.main: George Vincent Thomas  (25 June 1930 – February 2014) was a Welsh professional footballer. A wing half, he played for Cardiff City before joining Newport County in 1953, and went on to make 137 appearances in the Football League for the club between then and 1959.

response: *Sir George Thomas, 1st Baronet (died 1774), Deputy Governor of Pennsylvania 1738–1747, Governor of the Leeward Islands 1753–1766
